channel.title: Can you make the development roadmap official?
channel.description: Could we have an _official_ roadmap post or website? If there is already one, please share it. Otherwise I’ve picked up here and there a few things but a centralized location would be great!

item.title: Can you make the development roadmap official?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
I’d certainly be interested to hear if there are plans to expand the team.

There are stacks of great feature requests coming in, that hint at where the app could go, but which would only really be achievable if the team was to grow.

If that’s something the team might look into, and a second work-stream could open up, maybe prioritise that one on features that directly generate income. And yeah, I’m talking about open soundpack submissions and a marketplace.

I think what you’ve created is incredible, but I’m also not averse to paying for additional features.
(I don’t understand how some here ‘complain’ about the price of soundpacks. A soundpack for the price of a coffee or two. More than reasonable, imo.)

I would consider finding a way to release/sell the soundpacks on other platforms too. The quality is generally very high and I can certainly imagine creators wanting to play with them in other DAWs.
(Depends on the license agreement made with the creators, but it’s a model worth looking into, imo.)

Not suggesting being all-things-to-all-people, but a reasoned expansion into related output/revenue streams.

Anyhoo, enough for now.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you make the development roadmap official?
